scripts.start: npm run copy-assets && BROWSER='firefox' npx vite dev
scripts.start-debug: npm run copy-assets && DEBUG='true' BROWSER='firefox' npx vite dev
scripts.dev: npm run copy-assets && BROWSER='firefox' DEBUG='true' CAMPAIGN_ID='sandbox' npx vite dev
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npx vite build
scripts.preview: npm run copy-assets && BROWSER='firefox' CAMPAIGN_ID='sandbox' npx vite preview
scripts.copy-assets: rm -rf public/assets && mkdir -p public/assets && rsync --recursive assets/toDist/* public/assets
